sentences.en: At the bottom of HDI are Niger, Sierra Leone, Afghanistan and Guinea.
sentences.cn: 人类发展指数的最后几名是尼日尔 、 塞拉里昂 、 阿富汗和几内亚.

sentences.en: Bryan Sierra , a spokesman for the Justice Department, declined to comment.
sentences.cn: 来自司法部的发言人 布赖恩·斯莱瑞 则对此拒绝发表意见.

sentences.en: Cameroon have also qualified after beating Sierra Leone.
sentences.cn: 喀麦隆队击败塞拉利昂队之后也成功晋级.

sentences.en: Can you comment on the diamonds mined in Sierra Leone?
sentences.cn: 请您谈谈塞拉利昂开采钻石的问题好 吗 ?

sentences.en: In Sierra Leone, English is used as the medium of instruction for all primary education.
sentences.cn: 在塞拉利昂，基础教育阶段全部用英语授课。

sentences.en: In Sierra Leone, we helped defuse confrontations and keep peace moving forward.
sentences.cn: 在塞拉利昂, 我们帮助化解了对抗,使和平进程继续向前.

sentences.en: Sierra Leone and Burundi have been designated as the first two beneficiaries.
sentences.cn: 塞拉里昂与布隆迪被选定为最先两个受益国.

sentences.en: Sierra Madre is another, about the curse of gold and greed.
sentences.cn: 《碧血金沙》也是一例, 它是关于黄金与贪婪的诅咒.

sentences.cn: 苏菲亚是一名在西拉格达工作的土地委员.

sentences.en: The end of the Sierra Nevada cuts off all rain.
sentences.cn: 内华达山脉的尾部把雨水全挡住了.

sentences.en: The group already started to work with Cambodia, Sierra Leone and Syria.
sentences.cn: 这个组织已经开始与柬埔寨 、 塞拉利昂和叙利亚合作.

sentences.en: The Sierra Club was unable to meet this standard.
sentences.cn: 赛拉俱乐部难以满足这一标准.

sentences.en: They are Sierra Leone's national amputees soccer team.
sentences.cn: 他们是[狮子山截肢者足球队].
